sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the General Assembly Redistricting Act of 2021.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the General Assembly Redistricting Act of 2021.

sections.heading: Findings.  In enacting this redistricting plan, the General Assembly finds and declares all of the following:
sections.text: Findings. In enacting this redistricting plan, the General Assembly finds and declares all of the following:

sections.heading: Representative Districts. The State of Illinois is divided into 118 Representative Districts as set forth in this Section.
sections.text: Representative Districts. The State of Illinois is divided into 118 Representative Districts as set forth in this Section.

sections.heading: Representative Districts. The State of Illinois is divided into 118 Representative Districts as set forth in this Section and this Section shall take precedence over Section 10 unless amended by a subsequent amendatory Act of the 102nd General Assembly
sections.text: Representative Districts. The State of Illinois is divided into 118 Representative Districts as set forth in this Section and this Section shall take precedence over Section 10 unless amended by a subsequent amendatory Act of the 102nd General Assembly.

sections.heading: Legislative Districts.  The State of Illinois is divided into 59 Legislative Districts as set forth in this Section.
sections.text: Legislative Districts. The State of Illinois is divided into 59 Legislative Districts as set forth in this Section.

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
